actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to establish a mandatory commodity market for crude oil.

summary.text: Provides that six months after the effective date of this Act all sales of domestically produced crude oil and crude oil sold for use or resale within the United States shall be made through a commodity exchange by auction pursuant to rules and regulations promulgated by the President and under the supervision of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission.

titles.title: A bill to establish a mandatory commodity market for crude oil.
